Guideline: Use color roles not raw colors
Do: Use MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary etc
Use dynamicLightColorScheme dynamicDarkColorScheme
Don't: Force static colors on supported devices
Code Good: val colors = if (dynamicColor && Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= 31) dynamicLightColorScheme(context) else staticColors

Guideline: Use tonal palettes for custom colors
Do: Generate palettes from seed color
Code Bad: val primary = Color(0xFF6200EE); val primaryVariant = Color(0xFF3700B3) // manual

Do: Use MaterialTheme.typography.bodyLarge etc

Description: Display styles are for short impactful text
Do: Use Display for hero headlines

Description: Body Medium 14sp is the standard body text
Do: Use bodyMedium for main content
Use MaterialTheme.shapes.medium etc
Use shapes.extraSmall for small UI
Don't: Use large shapes for small components

Do: Use shapes.extraLarge for FAB bottom sheets

Description: M3 uses color tint not just shadow
Do: Surface elevation changes background tint
Don't: Rely only on shadow for elevation

Do: Use 0 1 3 6 8 12dp levels
Use filled Button for main CTA
Don't: Use filled buttons for all actions
Code Bad: Button { Text("Cancel") } // should be text or outlined

Do: Use TextButton for dismiss or tertiary actions

Description: FAB is for the primary action
Do: Use single FAB for most important action
Don't: Use multiple FABs or FAB for secondary actions
Code Bad: Row { FAB { Icon(Add) }; FAB { Icon(Edit) }; FAB { Icon(Share) } }

Do: Use NavigationBar with 3-5 items
Don't: Use more than 5 or less than 3 items

Do: Use emphasizedDecelerate for enter emphasizedAccelerate for exit
Use 300ms for smaller 400ms for larger animations
Don't: Use too short or too long durations
Code Bad: animate(durationMillis = 100) // too fast or 800 // too slow

Description: on* colors contrast with base colors
Do: Use onPrimary with primary onSurface with surface
Ensure 48x48dp minimum touch target

Description: Material 3 Expressive adds motion physics system
Do: Apply physics-based spring animations
Don't: Use linear or basic easing for interactions

Description: M3 Expressive adds morphing shape variations
Do: Use shape morphing for state transitions

Description: M3 Expressive expands color palette options
Do: Use emotional color combinations for mood
Code Good: Use warm colors for celebration cool for calm
Code Bad: Random color choices without emotional context

Description: M3 SearchBar provides full search experience
Do: Use SearchBar with DockedSearchBar

Description: FilterChip for selections InputChip for tags
Do: Use appropriate chip type for use case
Don't: Use Button instead of Chip for selections

Do: Use ModalBottomSheet with Scaffold
Use ListItem with headline supporting text
Don't: Build custom Row layouts for lists

Description: M3 defines list-detail supporting pane feed
Do: Use canonical layouts for tablets foldables
Switch to NavigationRail on medium screens
Show permanent drawer on expanded screens

Description: Use Container suffix colors for elevated surfaces
Do: primaryContainer surfaceContainer etc
Use surfaceContainerLowest to Highest for hierarchy
Code Good: surfaceContainerLow for cards surfaceContainer for app

Description: Shared element transition for detail views
Do: Use container transform for list to detail
Use fade through for tab switches
